summary: In the preface, Will Larson reflects on his journey as a writer, recalling his first blog post in 2007 and the evolution of his voice over the years. He acknowledges the importance of mistakes in his growth and attributes significant development to his experiences at Stripe. This book is presented as a culmination of a decade filled with lessons on leadership and management, inviting readers to learn from his insights.

slides.section_title: THE BEGINNING OF A WRITER'S JOURNEY
slides.section_body: My writing journey commenced on a significant day in 2007 with my first blog post. With 69 posts in that year, I reflected on the humble beginnings of my craft.
slides.quote: Every journey starts with a single step, and mine began with a simple blog.

slides.section_body: The next year brought 192 posts, yet I still grappled with finding my authentic writing style. Each attempt taught me something new.
slides.quote: Mistakes are not just obstacles; they are the stepping stones to discovering one's true voice.

slides.section_body: My growth stretched across a decade filled with writing and learning experiences. Each article contributed to my understanding of leadership.
slides.quote: Growth often requires time and reflection; it isn't a sprint, but a marathon.

slides.section_body: The transformative environment at Stripe played a crucial role in my development. Surrounded by innovative thinkers, I began to dream broader.
slides.quote: In an inspiring environment, possibilities blossom and creativity thrives.

slides.section_body: This book is a culmination of collective wisdom shared among colleagues. Their encouragement shaped the narratives I wished to convey.
slides.quote: True inspiration often springs from shared experiences and collaborative dialogue.

slides.section_body: I hope that each reader finds valuable insights in the forthcoming chapters. My intention is to share lessons that have resonated with me.
slides.quote: Learning is not merely a destination but a journey we share and grow through.

slides.section_body: Feedback is not only welcomed but cherished. I encourage readers to share their thoughts and experiences after engaging with the book.
slides.quote: Every thought shared shapes the conversation; your voice matters.

slides.section_body: In this preface, I express gratitude for my journey and the lessons encountered along the way.
slides.quote: In every story told, there's an opportunity for connection and shared understanding.

slides.section_body: Writing reflects the glory of the human experience; it is an art form in constant evolution.
slides.quote: The art of writing is a celebration of our shared humanity and its ongoing journey.

slides.section_title: A CALL TO ACTION FOR WRITERS
slides.section_body: To aspiring writers, I say embrace the imperfections of your craft. Take risks, learn from missteps, and allow your voice to flourish.
slides.quote: Dare to write, even if your early drafts resonate with imperfect beauty.
